description: This file defines a React functional component named TemplatePreview that renders a preview of a message template with variable substitution. It imports React, PropTypes, and common UI components like Card and Badge, and utilizes hooks such as useMemo.

methods.name: applyVariables
methods.description: Replaces placeholders in the text with actual variable values. Placeholders are of the form {{variableName}}.

methods.name: TemplatePreview({ name, language, category, body = '', footer = '', buttons = [], variables = {} })

ctags.name: TemplatePreview
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TemplatePreview({ name, language, category, body = '', footer = '', butt/
ctags.signature: ({ name, language, category, body = '', footer = '', buttons = [], variables = {} })
